channel.title: Doom Sword
channel.description: Well this is a sword i did from scratch tell me what you think of it im making more updates to make it better :) V1 [IMG]http://i1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa439/austinl28/DoomSword1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa439/austinl28/DoomSword3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa439/austinl28/DoomSword2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa439/austinl28/DoomSwordWF.jpg[/img] V2 [IMG]http://i1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa439/austinl28/DoomSwordupdate.jpg[/img] V3 [IMG]http://i1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa439/austinl28/doomswordv3.jpg[/img] I need "constructive criticism" for what i could do to make it better ;)

yup i thought the hilt looked BEAST so i tried the design but added more faces for a better fade

item.title: Doom Sword
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Google Mr Google
item.description:
@Mr_Google wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:15, topic:395466”]3v looks much better, nice to see you progressing.

For the next version try to learn about the outer edging of the sword (the more razor like part) like in this image. Also you can always look up some older type of swords on google or such to see the details of them and how they are made.

[/quote]
mmk ill try thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Doom Sword
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

3v looks much better, nice to see you progressing.

For the next version try to learn about the outer edging of the sword (the more razor like part) like in this image. Also you can always look up some older type of swords on google or such to see the details of them and how they are made.

Read full topic

item.title: Doom Sword
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“Mr Google, post:8, topic:395466”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=492653.msg3602693#msg3602693 date=1305759556]
Why doesn’t the blade touch the hilt?
[/quote]
it does what you talking about blade touches hilt perfectly :)[quote author=reyx7 link=topic=492653.msg3602687#msg3602687 date=1305759155]
Blade on v2 is to big. Seems flimy and unprorportunate. Add some more dimension, and make it a little skinnier.
[/quote]
k thanks finally for some CC[quote author=amy_webb link=topic=492653.msg3602200#msg3602200 date=1305705776]
Looks to me like you took the hilt off someone else’s sword model, and added a blade then completely made the model worse. I’m sorry, but the models you’re posting aren’t good. Seems to me like you’re not trying to improve, but get people to like you.
[/quote]
nope i made the hilt myself and im not finished i know the blade isnt that good im still working on it i have skool thought u did 2 amy?[/quote]
No the design, not the hilt itself. Also, i dont have school when you do. Unless you’re aussie. :\

Read full topic
